pageContext.claim: “Democrats have no complaint about the rioters and the vandals marauding through our cities or mass unruly demonstrations, but they don't believe law-abiding citizens can go to a church together, you can't go to church anymore.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a false choice Trump is making. Democrats, including Joe Biden, condemned the violent protests that caused damage.They do not opposes people going to church in line with pandemic-related social distancing protocols.
